content.prompt: Complete the following code in order to prompt the user for his/her full name (first name, middle name and last name separately) and then for his/her height in inches, then the code has to convert and display the height in inches to feet, then ft'' in', then meters.For the conversions, please consider that 12 inches is 1 foot. Also, use the conversion rate 0.0254 as your inches to meters conversion rate. For example, 1 inch is 0.0254 meters.Try to solve this problem by defining constant values (use keyword final) that will store the conversion rate specified above. Then, use these constant values in your calculations. (This is not a requirement but something that will make the code readability better) Note: The java.util.Scanner is already imported. In your submission, you do not have to import it again. If you import again, you will get an error in your submissions. E.g. For the input:First name: WilliamMiddle name: JeffersonLast name: ClintonHeight (in inches): 75For the output:Full Name: Clinton, William JeffersonHeight in inches: 75Height in feet & inches: 6 ft. 3 in.Height in feet:  6.0833 Height in meters:  1.854139
